messages.subject: Earth Day
messages.msgSnippet: My 9 yos just came in and asked what the date was. I told him it was the 22nd. He said, Oh, that means it s Earth Day today. What does Earth Day mean? I told
messages.messageBody:
My 9 yos just came in and asked what the date was.
I told him it was the 22nd.
He said, "Oh, that means it's Earth Day today. What does Earth Day mean?"
I told him it's a day about remembering to keep the earth alive and healthy and growing, planting things, etc.
And he said "Well, shouldn't you do that every day?"
I said, "yeah, you're right! We *should* do that every day."
LOL! I thought it was funny. :o)

Karin


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
